Patient Choice Restoration Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Patient Choice Restoration Act
This bill repeals the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010. Provisions of law amended by those Acts are restored as if those Acts had never been enacted.
